description:
Land at 9-14 Compton Road (inc land rear of 10 Prior Bolton Street)
(TPO ref: LBI TPO (#301/2006)

(T1) Sycamore x 1 - crown clean to include removing dead wood > 300mm in length and 20mm in diameter and any obviously compromised branches and lift crown to 5m above ground level
(T4) Lime x 1 - reduce as before (prune back to most recent reduction points and not below). 
(T5 & T6) Plane x 2 - re-pollard (back to most recent pruning points and not below)
(T8) Plane x 1 - crown clean to include removing dead wood > 300mm in length and 20mm in diameter and any obviously compromised branches and prune lower lateral growth back to clear building by 3m (inspect for plane tree branch dieback - Splanchnonema platani)
(T9) Lime x 1 - prune to clear adjacent tree and telephone lines, prune off epicormic growth, crown clean to include removing dead wood > 300mm in length and 20mm in diameter and any obviously compromised branches
(T10) Cherry x 1 - lift to achieve 2.5m clearance of footpath and 3m clearance of roadway
(T12) Sycamore x 1 - crown clean to include removing dead wood > 300mm in length and 20mm in diameter and any obviously compromised branches and reduce to previous pruned points and lift to 5m above ground level
